name: Distil Whisper Wrapper
description: The wrapper of Distil-Whisper, avaliable models: distil-large-v3, distil-large-v2, distil-medium.en, distil-small.en. The default model is distil-small.en.

output.description: Fully serialized text content of the recognized text in the input audio/video.
The smallest recognized unit of distil-whisper. Normally a complete sentence.

parameters.name: modelSize
parameters.description: The size of the model to use. There are four size of model to use distil-large-v3, distil-large-v2, distil-medium.en, distil-small.en. The default model is distil-medium.en.)

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: The JSON body of the HTTP response will be re-formatted with 2-space indentation
